Text: Would really love to download this. But is this shitty audio quality the best you could do? 192 kbps? Are you serious friend? This is not a sci-fi film. If size was the constraint, you could've easily shaved-off 1000 kbps video bitrate in favor of better audio. Waiting for your response. Thanks anyways.

do a little research before you open your trap - the 2 channel audio was all that was on the source - nothing wrong with the file size either.
and last but not least the uploader was not the encoder
